\doxysection{node\+\_\+modules/convert-\/source-\/map Directory Reference}
\hypertarget{dir_f013204aff36a6100990d843c8e8ec3e}{}\label{dir_f013204aff36a6100990d843c8e8ec3e}\index{node\_modules/convert-\/source-\/map Directory Reference@{node\_modules/convert-\/source-\/map Directory Reference}}


\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Converts a source-\/map from/to different formats and allows adding/changing properties.


\begin{DoxyCode}{0}

\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ .toJSON();}
\DoxyCodeLine{}

\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ .fromComment('//\#\ sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;base64,eyJ2ZXJzaW9uIjozLCJmaWxlIjoiYnVpbGQvZm9vLm1pbi5qcyIsInNvdXJjZXMiOlsic3JjL2Zvby5qcyJdLCJuYW1lcyI6W10sIm1hcHBpbmdzIjoiQUFBQSIsInNvdXJjZVJvb3QiOiIvIn0=')}

\end{DoxyCode}
\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10961}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{Upgrading}{Upgrading}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10961}
Prior to v2.\+0.\+0, the {\ttfamily from\+Map\+File\+Comment} and {\ttfamily from\+Map\+File\+Source} functions took a String directory path and used that to resolve \& read the source map file from the filesystem. However, this made the library limited to nodejs environments and broke on sources with querystrings.

In v2.\+0.\+0, you now need to pass a function that does the file reading. It will receive the source filename as a String that you can resolve to a filesystem path, URL, or anything else.

If you are using {\ttfamily convert-\/source-\/map} in nodejs and want the previous behavior, you\textquotesingle{}ll use a function like such\+:


\begin{DoxyCode}{0}
\DoxyCodeLine{+\ var\ fs\ =\ require('fs');\ //\ Import\ the\ fs\ module\ to\ read\ a\ file}
\DoxyCodeLine{+\ var\ path\ =\ require('path');\ //\ Import\ the\ path\ module\ to\ resolve\ a\ path\ against\ your\ directory}
\DoxyCodeLine{-\/\ var\ conv\ =\ convert.fromMapFileSource(css,\ '../my-\/dir');}
\DoxyCodeLine{+\ var\ conv\ =\ convert.fromMapFileSource(css,\ function\ (filename)\ \{}
\DoxyCodeLine{+\ \ \ return\ fs.readFileSync(path.resolve('../my-\/dir',\ filename),\ 'utf-\/8');}
\DoxyCodeLine{+\ \});}

\end{DoxyCode}
\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10962}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{API}{API}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10962}
\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10963}{}\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{from\+Object(obj)}{from\+Object(obj)}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10963}
Returns source map converter from given object.\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10964}{}\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{from\+JSON(json)}{from\+JSON(json)}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10964}
Returns source map converter from given json string.\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10965}{}\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{from\+URI(uri)}{from\+URI(uri)}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10965}
Returns source map converter from given uri encoded json string.\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10966}{}\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{from\+Base64(base64)}{from\+Base64(base64)}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10966}
Returns source map converter from given base64 encoded json string.\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10967}{}\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{from\+Comment(comment)}{from\+Comment(comment)}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10967}
Returns source map converter from given base64 or uri encoded json string prefixed with {\ttfamily //\# source\+Mapping\+URL=...}.\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10968}{}\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{from\+Map\+File\+Comment(comment, read\+Map)}{from\+Map\+File\+Comment(comment, read\+Map)}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10968}
Returns source map converter from given {\ttfamily filename} by parsing {\ttfamily //\# source\+Mapping\+URL=filename}.

{\ttfamily read\+Map} must be a function which receives the source map filename and returns either a String or Buffer of the source map (if read synchronously), or a {\ttfamily Promise} containing a String or Buffer of the source map (if read asynchronously).

If {\ttfamily read\+Map} doesn\textquotesingle{}t return a {\ttfamily Promise}, {\ttfamily from\+Map\+File\+Comment} will return a source map converter synchronously.

If {\ttfamily read\+Map} returns a {\ttfamily Promise}, {\ttfamily from\+Map\+File\+Comment} will also return {\ttfamily Promise}. The {\ttfamily Promise} will be either resolved with the source map converter or rejected with an error.\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10969}{}\doxysubsubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{Examples}{Examples}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10969}

\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10970}{}\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{from\+Source(source)}{from\+Source(source)}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10970}
Finds last sourcemap comment in file and returns source map converter or returns {\ttfamily null} if no source map comment was found.\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10971}{}\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{from\+Map\+File\+Source(source, read\+Map)}{from\+Map\+File\+Source(source, read\+Map)}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10971}
Finds last sourcemap comment in file and returns source map converter or returns {\ttfamily null} if no source map comment was found.

{\ttfamily read\+Map} must be a function which receives the source map filename and returns either a String or Buffer of the source map (if read synchronously), or a {\ttfamily Promise} containing a String or Buffer of the source map (if read asynchronously).

If {\ttfamily read\+Map} doesn\textquotesingle{}t return a {\ttfamily Promise}, {\ttfamily from\+Map\+File\+Source} will return a source map converter synchronously.

If {\ttfamily read\+Map} returns a {\ttfamily Promise}, {\ttfamily from\+Map\+File\+Source} will also return {\ttfamily Promise}. The {\ttfamily Promise} will be either resolved with the source map converter or rejected with an error.\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10972}{}\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{to\+Object()}{to\+Object()}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10972}
Returns a copy of the underlying source map.\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10973}{}\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{to\+JSON(\mbox{[}space\mbox{]})}{to\+JSON(\mbox{[}space\mbox{]})}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10973}
Converts source map to json string. If {\ttfamily space} is given (optional), this will be passed to \href{https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/JSON/stringify}{\texttt{ JSON.\+stringify}} when the JSON string is generated.\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10974}{}\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{to\+URI()}{to\+URI()}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10974}
Converts source map to uri encoded json string.\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10975}{}\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{to\+Base64()}{to\+Base64()}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10975}
Converts source map to base64 encoded json string.\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10976}{}\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{to\+Comment(\mbox{[}options\mbox{]})}{to\+Comment(\mbox{[}options\mbox{]})}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10976}
Converts source map to an inline comment that can be appended to the source-\/file.

By default, the comment is formatted like\+: {\ttfamily //\# source\+Mapping\+URL=...}, which you would normally see in a JS source file.

When `options.\+encoding == \textquotesingle{}uri'\`{}, the data will be uri encoded, otherwise they will be base64 encoded.

When {\ttfamily options.\+multiline == true}, the comment is formatted like\+: {\ttfamily /\texorpdfstring{$\ast$}{*}\# source\+Mapping\+URL=... \texorpdfstring{$\ast$}{*}/}, which you would find in a CSS source file.\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10977}{}\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{add\+Property(key, value)}{add\+Property(key, value)}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10977}
Adds given property to the source map. Throws an error if property already exists.\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10978}{}\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{set\+Property(key, value)}{set\+Property(key, value)}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10978}
Sets given property to the source map. If property doesn\textquotesingle{}t exist it is added, otherwise its value is updated.\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10979}{}\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{get\+Property(key)}{get\+Property(key)}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10979}
Gets given property of the source map.\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10980}{}\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{remove\+Comments(src)}{remove\+Comments(src)}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10980}
Returns {\ttfamily src} with all source map comments removed\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10981}{}\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{remove\+Map\+File\+Comments(src)}{remove\+Map\+File\+Comments(src)}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10981}
Returns {\ttfamily src} with all source map comments pointing to map files removed.\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10982}{}\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{comment\+Regex}{comment\+Regex}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10982}
Provides {\bfseries{a fresh}} Reg\+Exp each time it is accessed. Can be used to find source map comments.

Breaks down a source map comment into groups\+: Groups\+: 1\+: media type, 2\+: MIME type, 3\+: charset, 4\+: encoding, 5\+: data.\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10983}{}\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{map\+File\+Comment\+Regex}{map\+File\+Comment\+Regex}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10983}
Provides {\bfseries{a fresh}} Reg\+Exp each time it is accessed. Can be used to find source map comments pointing to map files.\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md10984}{}\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{generate\+Map\+File\+Comment(file, \mbox{[}options\mbox{]})}{generate\+Map\+File\+Comment(file, \mbox{[}options\mbox{]})}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md10984}
Returns a comment that links to an external source map via {\ttfamily file}.

By default, the comment is formatted like\+: {\ttfamily //\# source\+Mapping\+URL=...}, which you would normally see in a JS source file.

When {\ttfamily options.\+multiline == true}, the comment is formatted like\+: {\ttfamily /\texorpdfstring{$\ast$}{*}\# source\+Mapping\+URL=... \texorpdfstring{$\ast$}{*}/}, which you would find in a CSS source file.
